typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceData
source(output(
		OffSet as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OffsetsTable
SourceData, OffsetsTable join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CrossJoin
CrossJoin keyGenerate(output(EmployeeKey as long),
	startAt: 2L) ~> GenerateSurrogateKey
GenerateSurrogateKey derive(EmployeeKey = EmployeeKey + OffSet) ~> IncrementSurrogateKey
